description: Iain and Tania met at ENGR101 Labs after being place in the same lab group.

Iain asked Tania out. He set the first date to be at One Red Dog so Tania waited there for him. Unfortunately Iain got muddled up with restaurant names and meant Big Dogs on Blair. They were both sitting at different restaurants waiting for each other until Iain told Tania that he was waiting for her at Big Dogs on Blair.
Iain and Tania graduated from university.
Iain popped the question to Tania in Oriental Bay.
Iain and Tania had their Formal Betrothal Ceremony at Sts Peters and Pauls Church, Lower Hutt. This was followed by the engagement party at Royal Port Nicholson Yacht Club, Oriental Bay.
Iain and Tania are getting married in Lower Hutt at Sts Peter and Pauls Church, Lower Hutt. Their wedding reception will be at Boulcott Farm Heritage Golf Club, Lower Hutt.
